metadata.Title: CVE-2015-8072 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - negligible
metadata.Description: mediaserver in Android 4.4 through 5.x before 5.1.1 LMY48X and 6.0 before2015-11-01 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause adenial of service (memory corruption) via a crafted media file, akainternal bug 23881715, a different vulnerability than CVE-2015-6608 andCVE-2015-8073.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
